results.name: Tomb Raider: Curse of the Sword
Genghis Khan II: Clan of the Gray Wolf (1992)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7
  • Processor: 1GHz over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 800x600 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 22KHz WAVE file can be played
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7
  • Processor: 1GHz over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 800x600 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 22KHz WAVE file can be played
